title: Hana yori Dango (Movie) (Hana Yori Dango The Movie)
synopsis: Set in an alternative timeline to the TV series and manga, the movie features a classic Cinderella story told through the medium of 80's dance. Tsukushi Makino is a trainee dancer in a New York Performance group, struggling to become the star of the show with the help of Rui Hanazawa and Tsukasa Doumyouji.
characters: ['Domyouji, Tsukasa', 'Makino, Tsukushi', 'Hanazawa, Rui', 'Toudou, Shizuka', 'Mimasaka, Akira', 'Aoike, Kazuya', 'Nishikado, Soujirou', 'Matsuoka, Yuuki', 'Sanjou, Sakurako']
staff: [['Yamauchi, Shigeyasu', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Oshima, Michiru', ['Music']], ['Kamio, Yoko', ['Original Creator']], ['Nagamine, Tatsuya', ['Assistant Director']]]
